graph_title: Cases of crime victimization, by violence crime type
indicator_name: Proportion of persons victim of physical or sexual harassment, by sex, age, disability status and place of occurrence, in the previous 12 months
target_name: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities
un_custodian_agency: UNODC conducts a survey on UN-CTS(United Nations Survey on Crime Trends and the Operations of Criminal Justice System
computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
global_indicator_name: Proportion of persons victim of physical or sexual harassment, by sex, age, disability status and place of occurrence, in the previous 12 months
data_name: Cases of crime victimization, by violence crime type
indicator_definition: Victims of violence(sexual violence, robbery, assault, harrassment) per 100,000 population in the previous 12 months
computation_calculations: Interviews with 6,710 people(in 2019) aged 14 and over residing in Korea
source_organisation_1: Crime Investigation and Research Office, Korean Institute of Criminology
